element.short: Specific instances of data or objects that have been accessed
element.definition: Specific instances of data or objects that have been accessed.
element.comments: Required unless the values for Event Identification, Active Participant Identification, and Audit Source Identification are sufficient to document the entire auditable event. Because events may have more than one participant object, this group can be a repeating set of values.
element.requirements: The event may have other objects involved.

constraint.human: Either a name or a query (NOT both)
